analyzed: sāmānyam yaiḥ prakalpitam
moha granthi chide teṣām tad abhāvaḥ prasādhyate
katham idam avagamyate
paraspara vilakṣaṇa kṣaṇeṣu pratyakṣa samīkṣyamāṇeṣu abhinna dhī dhvani prasava nibandhanam anuyāyi rūpam sāmānyam na mānyam mānīṣiṇām iti
sādhaka pramāṇa virahāt bādhaka pramāṇa sambhavāt ca iti brūmaḥ
tathā hi yat idam sāmānya sādhanam anumānam abhidhīyate paraiḥ

original: yadanugatākāraṃ jñānaṃ tadanugatavastunibandhanaṃ yathā bahuṣu puṣpeṣu srak sragiti jñānaṃ /
analyzed: yad anugata ākāram jñānam tat anugata vastu nibandhanam yathā bahuṣu puṣpeṣu sraj sraj iti jñānam

original: asti ca parasparasamparkavikalakalāsu kāryyādivyaktiṣvanugatākāraṃ vijñānaṃ tadanaikāntikatādoṣākrāntaśarīratvānna tadbhāvasādhanāyālaṃ /
analyzed: asti ca paraspara samparka vikala kalāsu kāryya ādi vyaktiṣu anugata ākāram vijñānam tad anaikāntika tā doṣa ākrānta śarīra tvāt na tad bhāva sādhanāya alam

original: yato bhavati bahuṣu pācakeṣu pācakaḥ pācaka iti ekākāraparāmarśapratyayaḥ /
analyzed: yatas bhavati bahuṣu pācakeṣu pācakaḥ pācakaḥ iti eka ākāra parāmarśa pratyayaḥ
na ca teṣu anugatam ekam vastu samasti
tad bhāve hi prāk eva tathāvidha pratyaya utpāda prasaṅgaḥ durvvāra pracāraḥ
kriyā upakāra apekṣāṇām sva lakṣaṇānām sāmānya vyañjaka tvāt ayam adoṣaḥ iti ced
na etat asti
nityānām anādheya atiśaya tayā anupakāriṇi sahakāriṇi apekṣā yogāt

original: sātiśayatve vā pratikṣaṇaṃ viśarārūśarīratvāt kriyā kuta iti doṣoduṣpariharaḥ /
analyzed: sātiśaya tve vā pratikṣaṇam viśarārū śarīra tvāt kriyā kutas iti doṣaḥ uduṣpariharaḥ
kriyā nibandhana tvāt pācakeṣu anugata ākāra pratyayasya na anaikāntika tā doṣaḥ iti api vārttam
pratibhedam bhidyamānānām karmmaṇām tad nibandhana tva ayogāt

original: bhinnānāmapyabhinnākārajñānanibandhanatve vyaktīnāmapi tathā bhāvo na rāja daṇḍanivāritaḥ /
analyzed: bhinnānām api abhinna ākāra jñāna nibandhana tve vyaktīnām api tathā bhāvaḥ na rāja daṇḍa nivāritaḥ
tatas ca sāmānyam eva na upeyam syāt

original: iti mūlaharaṃ pakṣamāśrayatā devānāṃ priyeṇa suṣṭha anukūlamācaritaṃ /
analyzed: iti mūla haram pakṣam āśrayatā devānām priyeṇa anukūlam ācaritam
anena eva nyāyena kriyā kāraka sambandham abhinna jñāna nibandhanam upakalpayan pratikṣiptaḥ

original: pākakriyātvanibandhanaḥ pācakeṣvanugatākāraḥ pratyayastato nānaikāntikatādoṣa ityapi na mantavyaṃ /
analyzed: pāka kriyā tva nibandhanaḥ pācakeṣu anugata ākāraḥ pratyayaḥ tatas na anaikāntika tā doṣaḥ iti api na mantavyam
na hi artha antara sambandhinī jātiḥ artha antara pratyaya utpatti hetuḥ
atiprasaṅgāt

original: syādetat samavetasamavāyasambandhabalāt pākakriyāsāmānyaṃ pācakeṣvabhinnākāraṃ parāmarśapratyayamupajanayati tato na yathoktadoṣaḥ /
analyzed: syāt etat samaveta samavāya sambandha balāt pāka kriyā sāmānyam pācakeṣu abhinna ākāram parāmarśa pratyayam upajanayati tatas na yathā ukta doṣaḥ
tat idam api asāram
yat udaya anantara apavarjitayā karmmaṇām eva asambhavāt

original: vinaṣṭe karmmaṇi tat sāmānyaṃ na karmmaṇi tadabhāvādeva nāpi karttarīti sambadvasambandhopyasya nāstīti nābhinnapratyayahetuḥ /
analyzed: vinaṣṭe karmmaṇi tat sāmānyam na karmmaṇi tad abhāvāt eva nā api karttari iti sambadva sambandhaḥ upi asya na asti iti na abhinna pratyaya hetuḥ
tasmāt sthitam etat tad anaikāntika tā doṣa duṣṭa tvāt na idam anumānam sāmānya sattva asādhanāya paryyāptam iti
itas ca api na sāmānya sattva asādhanam idam anumānam

original: yathaiva hi parasparāsaṅkīrṇasvabhāvā api śābaleyādayobhāvāḥ kayācideva tadekakāryyapratiniyamalakṣaṇayā svahetubalāyātayā prakṛtyā tadekamabhimatamanugatarūpamupakurbbate,
analyzed: yathā eva hi paraspara asaṅkīrṇa svabhāvāḥ api śābaleya ādayaḥ bhāvāḥ kayācid eva tad eka kāryya pratiniyama lakṣaṇayā sva hetu bala āyātayā prakṛtyā tat ekam abhimatam anugata rūpam upakurbbate
tad apara sāmānya antaram antareṇa anyathā anavasthā prasaṅgāt

original: tathā tamekaṃ parāmarśapratyayamupajanayantu kimantarālagaḍunā vyatirekavatā sāmānyenopagatena /
analyzed: tathā tam ekam parāmarśa pratyayam upajanayantu kim antarāla gaḍunā vyatirekavatā sāmānyena upagatena
atha ucyate pratiniyata śaktayaḥ sarvva bhāvāḥ

original: etacca sāmānyāpalāpibhirapi niyatamabhyupagamanīyaṃ anyathā kutaḥ śālivījaṃ śālyaṅkurameva janayati na kodravāṅkuramiti /
analyzed: etat ca sāmānya apalāpibhiḥ api niyatam abhyupagamanīyam anyathā kutas śāli vījam śāli aṅkuram eva janayati na kodrava aṅkuram iti
para paryyanuyoge bhāva prakṛtim muktvā kim aparam iha vacanīyam asti
etat ca uttaram asmākam api na vanaukaḥ kula kavalitam

original: tathāhi vayamapyevaṃ śaktā eva vaktuṃ sāmānyamevopakarttuṃ śaktivyaktīnāṃ bhedāviśeṣe 'pi na tadekaṃ vijñānamupajanayitumiti /
analyzed: tathā hi vayam api evam śaktāḥ eva vaktum sāmānyam eva upakarttum śakti vyaktīnām bheda aviśeṣe na tat ekam vijñānam upajanayitum iti

original: anuttaraṃ vata doṣasaṅkaṭamatrabhavān dṛṣṭidoṣeṇa praviśyamāno 'pi nātmānamātmanā sambedayate /
analyzed: anuttaram vata doṣa saṅkaṭam atrabhavān dṛṣṭi doṣeṇa praviśyamānaḥ pi na ātmānam ātmanā sambedayate

original: tathāhi śālivījatadaṅkurayoradhyakṣānupalambhanibandhane kāryyakāraṇabhāve 'vagate śālivījaṃ śālyaṅkuraṃ janayituṃ śaktaṃ na kodravāṅkuramiti  #
analyzed: tathā hi śāli vīja tad aṅkurayoḥ adhyakṣa anupalambha nibandhane kāryya kāraṇa bhāve vagate śāli vījam śāli aṅkuram janayitum śaktam na kodrava aṅkuram iti
śakyam abhidhātum
na evam sāmānya tadvatoḥ upakāryya upakāraka bhāvaḥ kutaścana pramāṇāt niścitaḥ
tat katham idam uttaram abhidhīyamānam ādadhīta sādhi mānam iti alam alīka nirbandhanena
na sādhaka pramāṇa viraha mātreṇa prekṣāvatām asat vyavahāraḥ
tatas tad abhāva sādhakam anumānam abhidhīyamānam asmābhiḥ ākalyatām
yat yat upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam sat na upalabhyate tat tat asat iti prekṣāvadbhiḥ vyavaharttavyam
yathā ambara amburuham
na upalabhyate ca upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam sāmānyam kvacid api iti svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ
na ca atra asi dvi doṣa udbhāvanayā pratyavasthātavyam

original: tathā hyatrāsidvirbhavantī svarūpato viśeṣaṇato vā bhavet /
analyzed: tathā hi atra asidviḥ bhavantī svarūpataḥ viśeṣaṇataḥ vā bhavet
tatra na tāvat ādyam sambhavati
anya upalambha rupasya anupalambhasya abhyupagamāt
tasya ca sva sambedana pratyakṣa sākṣātkṛta sva rūpa tvāt kutas sva rūpa asidva doṣa avakāśaḥ
atha ucyate sva sambedanam eva na sambhavati
sva ātmani kriyā virodhāt
na hi tayā eva asi dhārayā sā eva asi dhārā chidyate
tat eba aṅgali agram tena eva aṅguli agreṇa spṛśyate iti
atas sidvaḥ eva ayam hetuḥ
tat idam sva sambedana śabda arthā parijñāna vijṛmbhatam eva prakaṭayati
tathā hi kala sa kaladhauta kuvalaya ādibhyaḥ vyāvṛttam vijñānam upajāyate
tena bodha rūpa tayā utpattiḥ eva asya sva sambittiḥ ucyate
prakāśa vat
na karmma karttṛ kriyā bhāvāt
ekasya an aṃśa rūpasya trairūpya anupapattitaḥ

original: yathaiva hi prakāśakāntaranirapekṣaḥ prakāśaḥ prakāśamāna ātmanaḥ prakāśaka ucyate /
analyzed: yathā eva hi prakāśaka antara nirapekṣaḥ prakāśaḥ prakāśamānaḥ ātmanaḥ prakāśakaḥ ucyate
tathā jñānam api jñāna antara nirapekṣam prakāśamānam ātmanaḥ prakāśam ucyate
tatas yam parama arthaḥ
na jñānam jñāna antara saṃvedyam upapadyate na api a sambiditam ucyate

original: yathāprakāre ca svasambedanaśabdārtha vivakṣite na kiñcid vacanīyakamasti kuto yathoktadoṣāvasaraḥ /
analyzed: yathā prakāre ca sva sambedana śabda artha vivakṣite na kiñcid vacanīyakam asti kutas yathā ukta doṣa avasaraḥ
nā api viśeṣaṇa asidvyā asidviḥ ūdbhāvanīyā
upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tayā sāmānyasya svayam eva paraiḥ upagamāt

original: tathānabhyupagame vā na sāmānyabalena vā kuleyādiṣvanugatākārau dhīdhvanī syātāṃ /
analyzed: tathā anabhyupagame vā na sāmānya balena vā kuleya ādiṣu anugata ākārau dhī dhvanī syātām

original: na hi yato yatra jñānābhidhānapravṛttistadanupalakṣaṇe tasya pratītirbhavati, daṇḍivat /
analyzed: na hi yatas yatra jñāna abhidhāna pravṛttiḥ tad anupalakṣaṇe tasya pratītiḥ bhavati daṇḍi vat
yat punar idam udyotitam udyota kareṇa
kim sāmānyam pratipadyase na vā
yadi pratipadyase katham apanhuṣe

original: atha na pratipadyase tadā tasyāsidvatvādāśrayāsidvo hetuḥ /
analyzed: atha na pratipadyase tadā tasya asidva tvāt āśraya asidvaḥ hetuḥ
tat idam tasya dharmmi svarūpi tā anabhijña tā vijṛmbhitam ābhāti

original: yato na vayaṃ vahīrūpatayā sāmānyaṃ dharmmitayāṅgīkurmmahe /
analyzed: yatas na vayam vahī rūpa tayā sāmānyam dharmmi tayā aṅgīkurmmahe
antar mmātra abhiniveśinaḥ bhāva abhāva ubhaya anubhava āhita vāsanā paripāka prabhavasya adhyasta vahis vastunaḥ jñāna ākārasya dharmbhi tayā upayogāt

original: sa ca svasambedanapratyakṣasidvatayā na śakyaḥ pratikṣeptuṃ /
analyzed: sa ca sva sambedana pratyakṣa sidva tayā na śakyaḥ pratikṣeptum
tat atra dharmmiṇi vyavasthitāḥ sat asatve cintayanti
kim ayam sāmānya śabda vikalpa pratibhāsa arthaḥ dharmmī para parikalpita vahis sāmānya nibandhanaḥ vā iti
tasya vāhya anupādāna tve sādhya tayā anupalambhaḥ hetuḥ
na punar tasya eva abhāvaḥ sādhyate
tad viṣaya śabda prayoga prasaṅgāt

original: evambidhe ca dharmmiṇi vivakṣite kuta āśrayāsidvidoṣaḥ /
analyzed: evambidhe ca dharmmiṇi vivakṣite kutas āśraya asidvi doṣaḥ
yat tu ucyate
pratyakṣa pramāṇa sidva svabhāva tayā sāmānyasya asidvaḥ eva ayam hetuḥ iti
tat ayuktam
tasya sva rūpeṇa apratibhāsanāt

original: idameva hi pratyakṣasya pratyakṣatvaṃ yat svarūpasya svabudvau samarpaṇaṃ /
analyzed: idam eva hi pratyakṣasya pratyakṣa tvam yat sva rūpasya sva budvau samarpaṇam

original: idaṃ punarmūlyādānakrayi sāmānyaṃ svarūpañca nādarśayati pratyakṣatāñca svīkarttumicchati /
analyzed: idam punar mūlya ādāna krayi sāmānyam svarūpam ca na ādarśayati pratyakṣa tām ca svīkarttum icchati
tathā hi na vayam paraspara asaṃkīrṇa śāvaleya ādi vyakti bheda pratibhāsana velāyām tad vilakṣaṇam aparam anugatam adhyakṣeṇa īkṣāmahe
kaṇṭha īśanam iva bhūteṣu
śāvaleya sāmānya budveḥ asidveḥ
tat katham adṛṣṭa kalpanayā ātmānam ātmanā vipralabhemahi
iti na asidvaḥ hetuḥ
nā api anaikāntika tā śaṅkā viṣayam atipatati
vipakṣa vṛtti adarśanāt
a sapakṣe sambhava anupalambhāt
sādhāraṇa anaikāntika tā mā abhūta
sandigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttika tā tu pratibandha adarśanāt anivārita prasarā eva
tat etat na samālocita tarka karkaśa dhiyām abhidhānam
viparyyaye bādhaka pramāṇa sāmarthyāt apasārita sadbhāva tvāt tad āśaṅkāyāḥ
tathā hi asattve sādhye sattvam vipakṣaḥ
tatra pratyakṣa vṛttyā bhavitavyam
yatas yat yadā avikala apratihata sāmarthyam tat tadā bhavati eva
tat yathā vikala bala sakala kāraṇa kalāpaḥ ṅkuraḥ

original: sati ca cakṣurādisākalye dṛśye vastunyavikalāpratibadvaśaktikāraṇaṃ pratyakṣaṃ jñānamiti svabhāvahetuḥ /
analyzed: sati ca cakṣuḥ ādi sākalye dṛśye vastuni avikala apratibadva śakti kāraṇam pratyakṣam jñānam iti svabhāva hetuḥ
tatas virudva upalambhāt vipakṣāt vyāvarttamānaḥ hetuḥ
asat vyavahāra yogya tvena vyāpyate iti vyāpti sidveḥ nā anaikāntikaḥ
abhimata sādhya pratibandha sidveḥ tu virudva tā dūratara samutsārita rabhasa prasarā eva

original: tādvetoḥ prastutavastusidvau sidvamasattvaṃ sāmānyasyetyalamatibadvavistaravisāriṇyā kathayeti viramyate /
analyzed: prastuta vastu sidvau sidvam asattvam sāmānyasya iti alam atibaddha vistara visāriṇyā kathayā iti viramyate
na ca vastu saṃsthāna vat sāmānyam vyakteḥ lakṣaṇam
na ca anuvṛtta vyāvṛtta varṇa ādi ātmake jāti vyaktī varṇa ādi niyata pratibhāsa pratīti prasaṅgāt

original: vyakterevāsau pratibhāsa iti cet ko 'parastarhi sāmānyasyānugatākāra iti cet /
analyzed: vyakteḥ eva asau pratibhāsaḥ iti ced kaḥ paraḥ tarhi sāmānyasya anugata ākāraḥ iti ced
nanu varṇa saṃsthāne virahayya kim aparam anugāmi vidyate

original: jātibyaktayoḥ samavāyabalādavibhāvitavibhāgayoḥ kṣīrodakayoriva parasparamiśraṇena pratipatteriti cet /
analyzed: jāti byaktayoḥ samavāya balāt avibhāvita vibhāgayoḥ kṣīra udakayoḥ iva paraspara miśraṇena pratipatteḥ iti ced
na tarhi sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ ekatarasya api rūpam gṛhītam

original: svarūpāgrahaṇe 'nayorapyagrahaṇamiti nirālambanaiva sā tādṛśī pratipattiriti paramārtha āveditastāvat nirālambanayā ca pratītyā vyavasthāpyamānaṃ  #
analyzed: sva rūpa agrahaṇe nayoḥ api agrahaṇam iti nirālambanā eva sā tādṛśī pratipattiḥ iti paramārthaḥ āveditaḥ tāvat nirālambanayā ca pratītyā vyavasthāpyamānam
sāmānyam su vyavasthāpitam
tasmāt viśeṣya asidvyā api na ayam asidvaḥ hetuḥ

original: sapakṣe varttamāno virudva ityapi na mantavyaḥ /
analyzed: sapakṣe varttamānaḥ virudvaḥ iti api na mantavyaḥ
anaikāntika tā api asya na sambhāvanām arhati
asat vyavahārāḥ napekṣa tvena hi dṛśya anupalambhaḥ vyāptaḥ

original: yadi hi sannapi tatra na pravarttayet /
analyzed: yadi hi san api tatra na pravarttayet
iha sāpekṣaḥ syāt
tatas vipakṣāt vyāpaka virudva avarudvāt

original: vyāvarttamāno 'sadvyavahāre viśrāmyatīti atastenāsadvyavahāreṇānupalambho vyāpyata iti kuto 'nekāntaḥ /
analyzed: vyāvarttamānaḥ sat vyavahāre viśrāmyati iti atas tena asat vyavahāreṇa anupalambhaḥ vyāpyate iti kutas na ekāntaḥ
tatas ca saḥ eva arthaḥ samāyātaḥ
etāsu pañcasu avabhāsanīṣu pratyakṣa vodhe sphuṭam aṅgurīṣu

original: sādhāraṇaṃ ṣaṣṭhamihekṣate yaḥ śṛṅgaṃ śirasyātmana īkṣate saḥ //
analyzed: sādhāraṇam ṣaṣṭham iha īkṣate yaḥ śṛṅgam śirasi ātmanaḥ īkṣate saḥ
iti
sarvvasya ca pūrvva uktasya ayam parama arthaḥ

original: pratyakṣapratibhāsi vartmana pañcasvaṅgulīṣu sthitaṃ sāmānyaṃ pratibhāsate na ca vikalpākārabudvau tathā /
analyzed: pratyakṣa pratibhāsi pañcasu aṅgulīṣu sthitam sāmānyam pratibhāsate na ca vikalpa ākāra budvau tathā

original: tā evāsphuṭamūrttayotra hi vibhāsante na jātistataḥ
analyzed: tāḥ eva asphuṭa mūrttayaḥ utra hi vibhāsante na jātiḥ tatas
sādṛśya bhrama kāraṇau punar imau eka upalabdhi dhvanī iti
kṛtiḥ iyam paṇḍita aśokasya
